alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 26 at 2:52AM PDT until June 26 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 50 mph in favored locations. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
